App(){const[isAuthenticated,setIsAuthenticated]=useState(false);const[isAdmin,setIsAdmin]=useState(false);const[videos,setVideos]=useState([]);const[currentVideoIndex,setCurrentVideoIndex]=useState(0);const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const
